title: Karam Dosa
content:
Prepare Dosa Batter: Dosa Batter/ South Indian pancake Batter How to make Karam dosa:
  • Keep tava on medium heat
  • Sprinkle water on it. To check tava heated or not
  • Remove water with paper towel or onion
  • Take one full medium sized ladle batter and pour at center of the tava
  • Spread it in circular motion, Apply oil around dosa
  • Flip Dosa when the color changes. Cook both sides
  • Add  Red Chilly Onion Chutney/ Erra karam  and Mumbai chutney at center of the dosa and spread all over dosa
  • Sprinkle Spicy Roasted chickpea Powder / Pappula podi / Bhuna Chana powder  from top
  • Next fold Dosa
  • Serve it when hot with  Red Chilly Onion Chutney/ Erra karam Chutney  and Mumbai chutney
